job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Back End Developer

As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on building and maintaining systems around LLM infrastructure and generative AI models, including quality assurance for these models and integrating them into a product portfolio. This aligns strongly with the definition and responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and deploying user-facing software systems that leverage generative AI.

phrases: scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models
Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases
provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain
integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'Back End Developer' and 'back-end engineer', and details responsibilities related to building, scaling, and integrating systems and services. This includes managing data sources and integrating AI platforms into a broader product portfolio, which are core software development activities for AI-powered applications.

phrases: quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: The role is centered around systems 'built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models'. It also involves 'quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models', indicating direct interaction with and management of generative AI models.

phrases: scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models
services and infrastructure around our AI models
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'scalability and reliability' of systems supporting LLM and AI models, and managing the 'services and infrastructure around our AI models', points to operational concerns for production-grade AI systems.

phrases: customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain
job_tasks.justification: The mention of enabling customers to 'upload and manage data sources' suggests involvement in the infrastructure and processes for handling data that feeds into or is managed by the AI systems.

phrases: integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio
